privacy.title: The Privacy Policy has been updated.
privacy.desc: Please review the updated Privacy Policy. By continuing to use PrivateUploader, you agree to the new Privacy Policy.

errors.notFound: The page you are looking for does not exist.

delete.aria: Delete item (Shift + Click to delete without confirmation)

ocr.title: Scanned text from image
ocr.tip: Tip: You can quickly copy the entire scanned text by right clicking the green OCR button.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.discordPrecachingDesc: * Discord precaching sends the PrivateUploader link of any media attachment to a Discord channel that gets cleared every 10 minutes in order to have the image cached by Discord by the time it's sent by yourself. Do not enable this if you don't trust Discord.
privacy.publicProfileDesc: Allow non-logged in users to view your profile if they have the link. By default only logged in users can view.
privacy.pulseDesc: By turning this off, you are disabling "Pulse" functionality. This is used for tracking how much time you spend on PrivateUploader, and what functions you use to generate your Insights. Some information may still be stored by PrivateUploader as outlined in the Privacy Policy.
privacy.groupPrivacy: Who can add you to a group?
privacy.friendPrivacy: Who can send you a friend request?

myAccount.title: My PrivateUploader
myAccount.emailSet: Your email is currently set to {email}.

totp.disabled: Give your account an extra layer of security by enabling 2FA.
totp.enableText:
If you'd like to enable it, you may do so here. You will need to scan the QR code or enter the secret in your desired 2FA application such as Authy or Bitwarden (recommended) and enter the code generated by the application.
2FA is a great way to add additional security to your TPU account, please note that if you lose access to the 2FA application, you won't be able to login.
totp.disableText: If you'd like to disable 2FA, you may do so here, your account will be more unsafe if you keep 2FA disabled, please ensure your password is secure.
totp.scan: Please scan the QR code or enter the secret into your desired 2FA application.
totp.cantScan: Can't scan the QR code? Enter the code.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.insightsDesc: * Words in screenshots and top chats are always hidden.

setup.title: API Key Options
setup.label: Select an API Key
setup.sharex: How to install the ShareX configuration:
setup.sharenix: How to install the ShareNix configuration:

sharenixSteps.1: Download and install ShareNix for your distribution.
sharenixSteps.2: Download and install Flameshot or another supported screenshot tool.
sharenixSteps.4: Move the downloaded config to ~/.sharenix.json, example:
sharenixSteps.5: Run sharenix {file} or sharenix-section (for a screenshot) to upload a file to PrivateUploader.

setup.automate: How to install the Automate config for Android:

automateSteps.1: Download the Automate app from the Google Play Store here.
automateSteps.2: Download the Automate .flo config from PrivateUploader.
automateSteps.3: From the 3 dots on the top right hand corner, press the "Import" button and import the .flo file using the file manager.
automateSteps.4: Select the imported PrivateUploader flow, and hit the "Edit" icon floating action button, and then the graph icon.
automateSteps.5: Modify the 3 top block variables collectionId, apiKey, path to your liking, collectionId may be null, this will send an additional network request to add any uploads to a collection from your device.
automateSteps.6: Start the flow, and enable the option to start flows at system boot in the app settings if you'd like.
automateSteps.7: Android 12 or lower is recommended. Android 13 may display a notification when an item has been newly copied to the clipboard, you may want to disable the auto clipboard copy block in this case.

setup.shortcuts: How to install the Shortcuts config for Apple iOS:

shortcutsSteps.1: Install the configuration file via iCloud.
shortcutsSteps.2: Follow setup screen and provide your PrivateUploader API key of choice.
shortcutsSteps.3: Enable the ability to use the accessibility button for quick screenshots in Accessibility -> Touch -> Back Tap -> [Select either Double Tap or Triple Tap] -> Scroll down to "SHORTCUTS" -> Select TPU.

integrations.scopesChanged: The application has changed the scopes it requests, please re-link your account.
integrations.unlinkWarningSaves: Disconnecting the application will not remove any saves associated with the application.

domains.title: Available Domains
domains.disclaimer: If you'd like your domain added, email troplo{'@'}troplo.com, ensure your domain has already been registered and configured with a DNS provider.

generic.name: Name
generic.option: No options selected | {count} option selected | {count} options selected

step0.description: Welcome to your new PrivateUploader instance! The open file sharing and social suite.
step0.subtitle: This wizard will guide you through the initial setup process such as setting up the database, and registering an account.

step1.title: Database Setup
step1.subtitle:
Please enter your MariaDB database credentials below.
WARNING: THIS WILL ATTEMPT TO MODIFY THE DATABASE SCHEMA, PLEASE ENSURE YOU HAVE A BACKUP BEFORE CONTINUING.
step1.testError: Connection failed, please check your credentials and try again.

step2.title: Admin Account
step2.subtitle: Please enter your admin account details below.

step3.title: Instance Configuration
step3.subtitle: Please enter your instance configuration below.
step3.name: Instance Name
step3.multiThreaded: Max thread utilization (0 for all threads, recommended)
step3.redisHint: If you are using Docker, the Redis hostname will likely be "redis". Redis is used for caching, this is an integral part of PrivateUploader, and it will not function without it.

step4.title: Features
step4.subtitle:
Please select the features you'd like to enable on your PrivateUploader instance.
The core features like Gallery are always enabled.

autoCollects.title: AutoCollects
autoCollects.description: Automatically add uploaded items by rules into PrivateUploader Collections.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Allow users to create collections of uploaded files.

communications.title: Communications
communications.description: A chatting platform built right into PrivateUploader.

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: Get weekly, monthly, yearly, and an evolving report about how each user uses their PrivateUploader account.

workspaces.title: Workspaces
workspaces.description: Allow users to create documents inside of PrivateUploader.

step5.title: Plan Configuration
step5.subtitle: Please select attributes of the default plan, such as storage per user.

step6.title: Mail Configuration
step6.subtitle: Please enter your SMTP credentials below.
step6.testEmail: Email address to send test email to

step7.title: Welcome to PrivateUploader!
step7.subtitle: Before continuing, PrivateUploader Server needs to be restarted, only 2 restarts should be necessary for the entire setup process.

step8.title: PrivateUploader Server is restarting... You will be redirected to the next step automatically.

step9.title: Setup Default Domain
step9.subtitle: PrivateUploader is designed to have an origin domain, this is used to manage PrivateUploader itself, and secondary domains which can be configured by the user, which is returned by the APIs for file uploads, this would usually be behind CloudFront, Cloudflare, or another CDN proxy.
step9.domain: Domain (please only base domain, no HTTPS)

start.dm: You have sent no messages to {username} yet.
start.group: There are no messages in {name} yet.

notificationOptions.noneDesc: This chat will be completely muted.

leave.title: Leave Group
leave.description: Are you sure you want to leave the group {name}? You will not be able to join back unless you use an invite, or are manually added back by another member with permissions.
leave.error: You must transfer group ownership to another person to leave the group.

delete.title: Delete Group
delete.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the group {name}? This is irreversible! You will be asked to confirm either your password or 2FA token to proceed.

home.name: Group Overview
home.groupNameDesc: Pick a snazzy name for your group!
home.avatarDesc: A square image with a minimum resolution of 256x256 is recommended.
home.backgroundDesc: This background is shown on your group's invite pages. Ensure it's 16:9
home.descriptionDesc: This description is shown on your group's invite pages.

add.title: Select Ranks
add.description: You can add as many ranks as you wish to a user!

manage.name: Rank Name
manage.nameDesc: Pick a fitting name for your rank!
manage.trustedUserDisabled: Only the group owner can update this permission.
manage.managedRank: This rank is special, it's automatically assigned to new users upon joining, and cannot be deleted or rearranged.

addUser.title: Select Friends
addUser.description:
You can friend people from their profile.
Adding two or more people will create a group chat.

invites.title: Send Invite
invites.description: Invites allow you to invite users outside of the PrivateUploader platform, and people whom have disabled the ability to directly add to groups.

emoji.name: Custom Emoji
emoji.description: You can add Custom Emoji which can always be used within the group, and in external groups for users that are part of your group. Max file size is 1MiB. Supported file types are: PNG/GIF/JPG/JPEG/SVG. Duplicate emoji names will be appended ~number which applies globally. If you see an emoji with this suffix, it does not reflect the true emoji name.

invites.name: Group Invites
invites.message: Some information may be hidden based on your permissions and the auto-granting rank.

upload.subtitle: This reporting period you uploaded the most at {hour}!

uploadsPerDay.subtitle: This reporting period you uploaded the most on {day}!

topWords.subtitle: See the top words in your screenshots!

topChats.title: Top chats
topChats.subtitle: See who you talk to in PrivateUploader Communications!

autoCollects.title: AutoCollects per hour
autoCollects.subtitle: See when you AutoCollect the most!

features.subtitle: Explore what PrivateUploader features you use the most!

insights.noDataDynamic: The dynamic report is being generated. Please check back in a few hours.

download.conversionHint: Please ensure the resulting file meets your expectations as it will be converted.

configure.warning: This operator {operator} is not recommended for this type {type}. It may not work as expected.

home.title: You have no pending approvals!

themeEditor.title: Theme
themeEditor.compatibilityWarning: The AMOLED theme is not recommended for use on themes that do not have a black background.

block.title: Block User
block.description: Are you sure you want to block {name}? They will no longer be able to message you, or view your profile.
block.silentModeDesc: With Silent Mode enabled, they will still be able to message you, and view your profile, but you will not receive any messages or notifications from them.
block.friendWarning: By blocking this user, they will be automatically removed from your friends list.
block.commsInputYou: You cannot message this user as you have blocked them.
block.commsInputThem: You cannot message this user as you're blocked.

unblock.title: Unblock User
unblock.description: The user will not be notified that they are unblocked, but they will immediately be able to message you and view your profile again.
